attributes.action: Acknowledge That The English are Entitled to a Homeland: England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The English people should be granted the same rights and privileges which we would expect to extend to other peoples, nations, races and creeds, to live independently and in pursuit of their own destiny, following their own principles, culture, and creed, in a homeland secure from external interference or disturbance by incursion whether forced or unforced, and by manipulation that diminishes the rights of the people to self-determination according to their own preferences in their own land.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
